install.name: Smartsef plugin - virtuemart
install.author: Richard@joomlatwork.com
install.copyright: (C) 2005 - 2007 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: Smartsef plugin for the virtuemart SEF urls

param.name: url_prefix_path
param.label: 1. URL prefix path
param.description: A URL prefix path for the virtuemart extenstion, leave empty if you don't want to use a prefix path (for example /mynewsfeeds)

param.name: page_alias_browse
param.label: 2. Alias for page: shop.browse
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart shop.browse parameter. Leave empty if you don't want to use this path setting in the URL

param.name: page_alias_product_details
param.label: 3. Alias for page: shop.product_details
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart shop.product_details parameter. Leave empty if you don't want to use this path setting in the URL

param.name: page_alias_flypage
param.label: 4. Alias for flypage: shop.flypage
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart flypage: shop.flypage parameter. Leave empty if you don't want to use this path setting in the URL

param.name: page_alias_ask
param.label: Alias for page: shop.ask
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart page: shop.ask parameter. (note: this parameter cann't be empty)

param.name: page_alias_manufacturer
param.label: Alias for page: shop.manufacturer_page
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart page: shop.manufacturer_page. Leave empty if you don't want to use this path setting in the URL

param.name: page_alias_vendor
param.label: Alias for page: shop.vendor_page
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart page: shop.vendor_page. Leave empty if you don't want to use this path setting in the URL

param.name: page_alias_shop_cart
param.label: Alias for page: shop.cart
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart page: shop.cart. (note: this parameter cannot be empty)

param.name: page_alias_checkout
param.label: Alias for page: checkout.index
param.description: Set the alias for the default virtuemart page: checkout.index. (note: this parameter cannot be empty)

param.name: print_alias
param.label: Alias for Print / poup page
param.description: Set the alias for the print / popup message (note: this parameter cann't be empty

param.name: url_append_itemid
param.label: Append item id to URL
param.description: Append the item id to the SEF URL

param.name: url_structure_product
param.label: URL structure for product
param.description: Select the URL structure for the product
